title: Business trip
description: Travel between my home and my work, when remote work isn’t an option or work travels can’t be canceled

title: Doing grocery
description: Travel to purchase essential goods within the nearest authorized facilities (list available at gouvernement.fr).

title: Health reason
description: Travels for medical consultations that can’t be done remotely

title: Assistance to vulnerable people
description: Travels for family reasons, to assist vulnerable individuals, or for child care

title: Brief trip
description: Short travels, close to home, for individual physical activity (excluding group sports or proximity with other individuals), or for walking pets.

title: General interest missions
description: participation to general interest missions commissioned by an administrative authority
